bug.author: kruus
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Warning (unused variable) if using cblas.</denchmark-h>
Should the call to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/01org/mkl-dnn/blob/ede1e332a0d32cbac02f5522334e6128e7d6988e/src/cpu/gemm_convolution.cpp#L100>cblas_sgemm</denchmark-link> use *, instead of , to match the sgemm call?

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kruus>@kruus</denchmark-link> , Good to hear from you! Will take a look. So far seems like a bug indeed.
